title: NO FEE /  2 bed, 1 Bath
posting_body: Excellent opportunity to rent in great Auburndale neighborhood!
Heat/hot water, electric and internet included!

This apartment is located on the first floor and has an updated kitchen with stainless steel appliances including dishwasher, laundry services, fridge, microwave, electric stove and 2 off-street parking spots.
Walk to Green Line, Commuter Rail, or Xpress Bus. 2-minute drive to 128 or Mass.
Close to Supermarket, restaurants and cafes.
Dead end street (Bencliffe Circle) leads to private pathways to Auburndale Park.
